metadata.title: Infections and Their Role in Childhood Asthma Inception

abstract.original_text: The association of early onset wheezing with common viral and bacterial infections has raised significant interest in the role of infections in childhood asthma inception. This article serves to review these relationships among infections, host factors, and asthma inception in childhood.

sentences.segment_text: The association of early onset wheezing with common viral and bacterial infections has raised significant interest in the role of infections in childhood asthma inception .
This article serves to review these relationships among infections ,
host factors , and asthma inception in childhood .
